news.title: From mustard makeovers to beef tallow, six food and beverage trends that could take over

news.title: CNBC Daily Open: Divergence between official and ADP jobs reports reveals two labor markets
news.summary: The huge divergence between the ADP and BLS reports could point to a growing schism in the U.S. labor market. It could also point to the possibility of a recession in coming months.

news.title: Apple scores big victory with 'F1,' but AI is still a major problem in Cupertino
news.summary: Wall Street's reaction to the company's AI announcements at WWDC suggest there's some trouble underneath the hood. While "F1" was a victory lap for Apple, Wall Street's Reaction to the Company's AI Announcements suggest there may be some trouble ahead.

news.title: Trump's Vietnam pact takes aim at China — but it raises more questions than answers
news.summary: The trade pact's scant details have left economists wondering about what it would mean for the flow of Chinese goods rerouted through the country.

news.summary: “We don’t know where we will retire. It could be South Carolina, Georgia, Alabama, Mississippi or Texas,” he says.

news.title: ‘Finance makes me break out in hives’: I inherited $240K from my parents. Do I pay off my $258K mortgage and give up my job?
